message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I am only able to pay up to $80 for the product. Would that work for you?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $95, which is still a good deal for you considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to counter with an offer of $85. This is my final offer, as I am not able to pay more.

Bob, I understand this is your final offer, but $85 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90. If this doesn't work, I'll have to consider selling to someone else. Let me know what you think.
